00011 // uber.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "material.h"
00014 // UberMaterial Class Declarations
00015 class UberMaterial : public Material {
00016 public:
00017         // UberMaterial Method Declarations
00018         UberMaterial(Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > kd,
00019                 Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > ks,
00020                 Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > kr,
00021                 Reference<Texture<float> > rough,
00022                 Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > op,
00023                 Reference<Texture<float> > bump) {
00024                 Kd = kd;
00025                 Ks = ks;
00026                 Kr = kr;
00027                 roughness = rough;
00028                 opacity = op;
00029                 bumpMap = bump;
00030         }
00031         BSDF *GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const;
00032 private:
00033         // UberMaterial Private Data
00034         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kd, Ks, Kr, opacity;
00035         Reference<Texture<float> > roughness;
00036         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap;
00037 };
00038 // UberMaterial Method Definitions
00039 BSDF *UberMaterial::GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const {
00040         // Allocate _BSDF_, possibly doing bump-mapping with _bumpMap_
00041         DifferentialGeometry dgs;
00042         if (bumpMap)
00043                 Bump(bumpMap, dgGeom, dgShading, &dgs);
00044         else
00045                 dgs = dgShading;
00046         BSDF *bsdf = BSDF_ALLOC(BSDF)(dgs, dgGeom.nn);
00047 
00048         Spectrum op = opacity->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00049         if (op != Spectrum(1.)) {
00050             BxDF *tr = BSDF_ALLOC(SpecularTransmission)(-op + Spectrum(1.), 1., 1.);
00051             bsdf->Add(tr);
00052         }
00053 
00054         Spectrum kd = op * Kd->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00055         if (!kd.Black()) {
00056             BxDF *diff = BSDF_ALLOC(Lambertian)(kd);
00057             bsdf->Add(diff);
00058         }
00059 
00060         Spectrum ks = op * Ks->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00061         if (!ks.Black()) {
00062             Fresnel *fresnel = BSDF_ALLOC(FresnelDielectric)(1.5f, 1.f);
00063             float rough = roughness->Evaluate(dgs);
00064             BxDF *spec = BSDF_ALLOC(Microfacet)(ks, fresnel, BSDF_ALLOC(Blinn)(1.f / rough));
00065             bsdf->Add(spec);
00066         }
00067 
00068         Spectrum kr = op * Kr->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00069         if (!kr.Black()) {
00070                 Fresnel *fresnel = BSDF_ALLOC(FresnelDielectric)(1.5f, 1.f);
00071                 bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(SpecularReflection)(kr, fresnel));
00072         }
00073 
00074         return bsdf;
00075 }
00076 // UberMaterial Dynamic Creation Routine
00077 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Material * CreateMaterial(const Transform &xform,
00078                 const TextureParams &mp) {
00079         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kd = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("Kd", Spectrum(1.f));
00080         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Ks = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("Ks", Spectrum(1.f));
00081         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kr = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("Kr", Spectrum(0.f));
00082         Reference<Texture<float> > roughness = mp.GetFloatTexture("roughness", .1f);
00083         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > opacity = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("opacity", 1.f);
00084         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap = mp.GetFloatTexture("bumpmap", 0.f);
00085         return new UberMaterial(Kd, Ks, Kr, roughness, opacity, bumpMap);
00086 }
